pr_title: DEV-1575 Add command line options for subnet and network tags

timeline.message:
DEV-1575 Add command line options for subnet and network tags

Subnet is optional, and if not specified the old behaviour of using the same name as the
network is used (and the region for everything else). Tags are added to the instance when
specified.

timeline.bodyText: Should we also have a test to ensure it defaults to the network when the subnet isn't given?
timeline.author: nedleitch

timeline.message: DEV-1575 Add test for no subnet specified

DEV-1575 Allow for specification of full URLs as well

Must start with projects, allows for more flexibility in VPC setups.
